Text: Mary Shelleys mother was Mary Wolstencraft and her "Man about town" was one Continental Army Liuetenant Gilbert S. Imlay an ancestor of mine ...knowing the men in my family I have often wondered if the this association ever influenced her in dipicting the monster ;)  ..again thank you so much!

This has to be incomplete. the book is over 200 pages and the total length of this is about 50 mins.
I checked on librivox, and they have a version that is far longer than this one. Id recommend just dl'ing it there instead of this.
This must be some seriously abridged version. Less than an hour long, but it should be more than eight hours.
Some info would be nice.. is this really abridged?
